Name: Avirup Guha Roy
Title: Man Made Reservoir & Lake
Review: This Man made lake, lying 20 km to the west of Hyderabad, was built in 1920 by the VIIth Nizam - Mir Osman Ali Khan....spread over an area of 46 sq km, its created by the dam across the river Isa... this is still the main source of water supply for Hyderabad & Secunderabad

Name: anuj1401
Title: Waste of time
Review: Access road to lake is closed…park in front of Golkonda Resort is ok ok.. it doesn’t have washroom facility.. don’t waste your time..

Name: kk2089
Title: Closed for construction
Review: Place is closed and under construction, the nearby Jalamandal park is also closed ;Came after disappointment.The govt officials have not even put proper boards informing visitors, what a pity !

Name: Abhishek S
Title: Good Visit
Review: Visit this place early morining.It is a good road drive from Hyderabad.You can enjoy sunrise here and enjoy the cool breeze.Can take beautiful pictures and can do jogging there

Name: sree143in
Title: Plesent
Review: A Plesent place of evening visits. and some time to spend. good to visit once atleast. nice look of nature.

Name: Sunil
Title: Sunset  view
Review: The lake is really good and clean and well maintained and the best thing is to watch sunset at evening. It’s one of the best thing to watch

Name: Sudhir K
Title: Great place for a walk or peaceful moment
Review: I have been a couple of times to this place. It's a quite place and there are two small parks, which has entry fee. The place is nice in evening and one can spend 1-2 hours with family. During dusk time, some insects are there. Limited snacks facility available. Overall, i think its a good place to go with family for 1-2 hours, very quite not much activity but kids can get some free space to roam around.

Name: Sounak Poddar
Title: Sunset
Review: Very nice place to be during the sunset. very quiet and peaceful. Very few places are here in Hyderabad where to enjoy sunset, and this is one of them.

Name: jainms
Title: OK
Review: Osman sagar Lake is located outskirts of Hyderabad and not well maintained. Can visit once as one of the visiting place but nothing much to expect from here.

Name: beyondtravel
Title: Beautiful lake
Review: A very picturesque man made lake made by nizam of Hyderabad, located 15 km from city,  not commercialised hence simple. Good for sunset

Name: drpuneetkansal
Title: Hyderabad diaries
Review: In India we have many tourist spots if govt or tourism deptartment develops them a lot of people will get employment.

Name: EaterNGo
Title: can see once
Review: the late is beautiful, but i think many things can done to attract tourist here, perhaps can add some fun fair activities

Name: S R V
Title: Lake bereft of people
Review: This lake is 7 kms from Chilkur Balajee temple. The travellers can walk down the dam site and see the lake around. On a hot day we went and so no much crowd.

Name: Udayan N
Title: Nice lake
Review: Good place to go and chill out..but roads leading to lake from some areas is very dangerous during rainy season..also view during rainy season is good there

Name: Dilip kumar
Title: One of the timepass
Review: This lake will make your time pass well and you can enjoy with your friends.you can visit this place anytime.

Name: Usha65
Title: Favorite place
Review: It is my childhood favorite, very beautiful place near the Gandipet lake. It is a popular picnic spot for the people of Hyderabad. The facilities are to be improved.

Name: Daniel T
Title: More famous as Gandipet lake
Review: This water body which supplies drinking water for Hyderabad is very important for the city. Its more famous as Gandipet lake, given the area next to this is called Gandipet.There is a park next to this, which is a good place to bring young kids & family to spend a pleasant evening.Route to this place is isolate after sunset, with not enough street lights or amenities. So be careful to stay around after sunset.

Name: Subhasree M
Title: Nice for day picnic
Review: We visited this place last week. We planned for a day picnic and started around 11am and reached within an hour. There is a park at the destination, which has actually no view of the lake. Though there are lawns and trees and playgrounds for kids, but as the scenic beauty is completely confined within big nets, we didn't like the place much. After a short breakfast, we chose to move out and started walking beside the path of the lake. After few minutes we reached at another park and this time its better. We had lunch and played on the lawn. Kids enjoyed playing with ducks and hens. Had a beautiful view of sunset. As the day ends, we started to packup.Overall, had a nice day outing with friends. Recommend for one time visit.

Name: rsraghavan6
Title: Good place
Review: Used to be an Amazing place before. Now most part of this area is locked. Osman Sagar lake is quite Big and people mostly come here for chilling and enjoy the scenic beauty!!!

Name: venkatakarthik
Title: best place for a selfie addict
Review: been there with a selfie addict friend and most of the time i spend clicking his images in various poses, best for couples and friends who want to chill out. the garden is great...

Name: deepa v
Title: Nice lake
Review: The lake is situated in gandipet There is a small park and people can spend few hours here..Lot of greenery.People visit especially with friends.

Name: Debsree Pande
Title: Sunrise and Sunset Point
Review: This place has a park which I haven't liked personally.But there is a point from which you can experience the breath taking view of sunrise and sunset and another point from where the city view is amazing.

Name: SRIKAKOLAPU
Title: pretty good
Review: Its pretty good with all the birds and natural scenic beauty.Mist go to this place if you stay in hyderabad.WIll be good in the morning for photos

Name: Avishek Chatterjee
Title: A Serene place a little bit out of the city
Review: I went to this place during the sunset, it is located near the financial district, outer ring road.The place is serene and very nice with not that much of activities. Its actually a dam built long back on the Musi river for the water supply of Hyderabad. The place is good as a picnic spot as well

Name: sudeshrele
Title: Breathtaking Lake of Nizam Era
Review: The lake was built during Nizam era o protect city from flooding. its a huge lake with a dam that divides city in 2 parts as Hyderabad & Secunderabad.

Name: Anamika K
Title: OGood place
Review: On the outskirts of Hyderabad, also known as Gandipet is the Osman Sagar lake. Elless world, Ocean park and Treasure island surround this lake, making it a famous tourist destination.

Name: Sam S
Title: The water bottle of Hyderabad.
Review: This lake served as a water bottle to the people of Hyderabad for 400 years. The Telangana Govt. has done a good thing by imposing restrictions on construction activities within a 100 Kms vicinity so as to restore the water catchment/storing feature of the lake. History tellers say that more than 40 villages were evacuated to build this lake which houses a water conversion plant. Its a good picnic spot for tourists, families, locals etc. Environment protection measures must be enacted to save it from pollution.

Name: GayathriSharma
Title: Evening sunset is beautiful
Review: Beautiful place to enjoy nature from concrete jungle.prefer sunset and sun raise timings to enjoy nature.

Name: Rajani K
Title: Full of life
Review: This is also a man made lake in the city of Hyderabad. Since it was monsoon time during my visit, it was full of water and looked so lively.  This lake supplies water to several places in the city. The lake side is a soothing place for people to enjoy a morning or evening walk watching the nature and few birds who visit the spot.

Name: pjanil1968
Title: Nice place
Review: Wonderful place to spend time with family especially on weekends or evenings. Nice view of sunset. Love the place a lot

Name: Gaurab2017
Title: Good Hangout Place with Friends
Review: If you want to witness a water body and a green surroundings - Gandipet is one of that place. Situated on Osman Sagar Lake, easily flocked by college goers and couples. One can come during rainy season to actually some water content in the lakes. Good Time pass place though.

Name: kc_dude
Title: A scenic place with some high viewing points
Review: Visted this place one evening and a pretty good place for relaxed walk or simply resting for some time. There is a gated road that you can walk along the lake bank and enjoy the breeze. There is a small hill and view point for photo oppertunities.There were couple of small vendors and a restroom facility. Nothing more.The place closes early like 5 or 6PM and it should open late. May not be a good place in the sunny day time.

Name: Im O
Title: Osman sagar lake
Review: Osman sagar lake is beautiful place of hyderabad.view of lake in evening get more attracted..nice to visit with friend and family

Name: SaiKumardaram
Title: Great place to spend with Family in low budget
Review: It is a great water body. Picnic Spot with family or friends or couple.Great when visit in months from July to Jan.

Name: higghligght shiva
Title: Beauty of Gandipet lake
Review: O.S.L. is 18 kms from mehdipatnam to gandipet there we have only 2 bus no's it is 120 &220 it is on timings. Lake is very nice full of water and plants, from top. it is very cool breeze & touching on my cheeksthere is nearby 2 gardens r there 1,Dwaraka & 2,rock garden.D differencebetween dwaraka garden It is very big and very good for friends and familiescome & play games ,they will enjoy a lot. full of disturbance , heavy noisein rock garden is a small many couples are spotting there. silence & peacefull i think this is best place 4 couples. i never think this place looks like Extraordinary. Y i miss this type of place or i shall  can'texpress in words but weakends much crowd R there i gone with my life patner i want 2 stay there only. . near bysome attraction R there saibaba & Gandi maisama temples, Ocean park.Out side some chill out snacks ,fast food etc.This locations is very good for all to see & 2 take pics

Name: Sweetbunnycute
Title: Mesmerizing view of the lake
Review: the lake of osman sagar is a water reservoir in hyderabad and it is a place to go in the morning and walk around the lake or may be meditate or take your bicycle along and cycle or just sit back and enjoy the natural beauty. it is located in gandhipet village. the view of the lake from the top of a big rock is mesmerizing. also there are a lot of big boulders(rocks) present on which one can climb and have a really good time with nature. if one can find time for themselves and wants to spend quality time with their families especially children or one enjoys natural beauty with peace then s/he should visit this place for sure.

Name: adventurous_adi
Title: Used to be a decent place to visit
Review: I used to often drop by this place either early mornings or late evenings with friends as it was a decent place for outdoor activity. Over the period of time it has deteriorated, roads are at times blocked due to some ongoing construction or  barricaded by traffic police. There are very few water bodies in Hyderabad little away from the city for a walk or bike ride, if such places are also blocked then there would be no other place to hangout.

Name: rambha b
Title: A lot more beautiful during the Sunrise
Review: We decided to watch the Sunrise near the lake. It was a long amazing road trip from Hyderbad to reach there before 5:30 am. Watched the orangish sky, clouds with golden lining and the powerful Sun God rising up in the sky.  The golden rays of the sun falling into the lake waters gave an spectacular view.  We spend some time sitting on the bank of the lake enjoying the cool gentle breeze and took a stroll along the lake shore.

Name: Subodh B
Title: Decent place to visit. Nothing exciting though.
Review: Away from the city. Averagely crowded even on a hot May afternoon. Parking is available. No restaurants at this location.

Name: Rajani B
Title: Serene place
Review: This is an artificial lake which is fed with water from Musi river.  It was constructed in the first half of 20th Century to provide a supporting source of water for the residents of Hyderabad city.  Before this lake, only Hussain Sagar lake catered to the water needs of the city. The place is very beautiful and serene. The lake provides cool,serene environment within the city premises.

Name: gani1997
Title: Place to enjoy
Review: I suggest you to visit this place during day time but its just a place to sit and chill the scenery for some time. Its gud go and have a visit.

Name: Rao1940497
Title: Just enjoy
Review: Once upon a lovers paradise like, with some even committing suicide due to breakdowns, it is just worth for a time pass.

Name: Parag Kumar R
Title: T
Review: It's an good one to visit with family. Loved it. Awesome place to stay. Would prefer this every time.

Name: Manish K
Title: A large and beautiful expanse of water
Review: The Osman Sagar Lake was built by the erstwhile Nizam of Hyderabad to ensure regular water supply to the city. While the city now draws its water from other sources, this massive lake retains its charm as a popular picnic and holiday destination. Located in Gandipet in western Hyderabad, it may not be as renowned as the Hussain Sagar Lake in the heart of the city, but has plenty to offer. it has nice gardens, including one on a small island next to the dam, good vantage points to click photographs as well as a couple of amusement parks nearby. However, only visit it when it has water and not when dry.

Name: Saurabha W
Title: Take a break from noisy city area and spend some time here!
Review: Its not a very big lake, but a beautiful one. You can click beautiful pictures here. Good place to spend some quite time from city. If you are lucky you might see some bikers doing amazing stunts- it seems it is a practice place for these guys(usually at morning time). Keep something to eat, as there are not any option to buy something to eat.

Name: None I
Title: Quite Peaceful place
Review: This lake is housed in the centre of Hyderabad city.  It is smaller than Hussain Sagar Lake. This lake is the source of water for Hyderabad city.  Since we visited during the rainy season, this lake had abundant water. But it usually dries up during the Summer season.  One can visit the lake during morning or evening and enjoy a stroll around the lake.

Name: pinaki50
Title: Soothing calm waters
Review: We were just finishing our Golkonda fort visit when our guide mentioned about Osman sagar lake n said that as it was only about 10 km from Golkonda fort we should have a look. So a 20 - 25 minute drive brought us to this vast lake. It is a lake basically formed because of a barrage on a river called Musa and has been constructed a long time ago. There is a very nominal entry ticket and a pretty big building on the side. The lake looked ideal for boating but we couldn't see any boats around. Serene surroundings compared to the city bustle.

Name: richa t
Title: Peacfeul and Must visit for Solitude seekers
Review: this is a nice and peaceful place, not very crowded. If you are a solitude seekers.. This is youe place

Name: Somashekhar N
Title: Large water body, Awkward smelly
Review: This is a average kind of lake with lot of unnavigable areas. This could do with a lot of better management to improve the experience for those visiting it.

Name: anithaaravamuthan
Title: Photographic view!!!
Review: The View was excellent and very natural near to the lake side view. We had a very nice time with our family in the evening.

Name: Gugan_Ilango
Title: Beautiful lake for photography
Review: Osman sagar lake is the a great place for good HDR photo at early morning and must visit to have good walk

Name: Anupama
Title: on the way to golkonda fort
Review: did not really visit it as i had already visited hussain sagar lake. however it is on the way to golkonda fort

Name: tandonmani
Title: Natural lake side view
Review: If you are a nature lover and wants to spend quality time with your friends and family it's a place to visit. Many eatery options are there along with steamer ride give you a pleasant experience to be here in Hyderabad.

Name: mainhole07
Title: Sagar Kinaare
Review: We use to spend many times over there just park your vehicles and walking with nearly having awesome experience.

Name: udaykanth11
Title: Worthy evening escape
Review: These days there is a tall grill on the actual bund so getting sunset pics is not so easy. Yet, it makes for a nice drive to reach the place and you can enjoy the sunset colors if you plan it right.

Name: Veeresh k
Title: Superb location..
Review: Once we gathered at Sagar lake... We had a great time... It was very peaceful and calm.. it damn too looking good...

Name: lankavignesh
Title: good gathering spot
Review: it one of the best place for gathering of friends.the location is also very beautiful and it is very peaceful and a good place to enjoy

Name: AVEMEADOWS Vagamon
Title: The lake is beautiful and big
Review: The walk around the lake is good and you can sit and enjoy some breeze. The view is good and spent some time around it

Name: santosh2ind
Title: Osman sagar lake
Review: This lake is also called gandipet lake. it was constructed by meer osman ali khan. this is beautiful lake.

Name: kmegha911
Title: Peaceful and Beautiful Spot
Review: The lake is surrounded by beautiful views and greenery.You will often see picknickers lounging around,eating out of large picnic hampers or playing cards here.Small vendors also selling delicious food near the lake.

Name: BRKanth
Title: Famous Gandipet
Review: Popular place during summer play. Not much water earlier but now there is some bcz of rains. Somewhat crowded during week ends.

Name: jainneha
Title: Osman sagar
Review: It is a beautiful lake in middle of twin cities of Hyderabad and Secunderabad.there are Parks around there . A nice and refreshing place

Name: nagesh1955
Title: Visit of gandipet
Review: Very big water area in the city, all the IT employees will gather here in the weekends, very good place to see

Name: AnjanManda
Title: Lovely lake
Review: Osman Ali Khan,the last Nizam of Hyderabad built the Dam on Musi river in 1920,hence called the Osmansagar .But it is popular as Gandipet.The lake used to be major drinking water source of twin cities.The lake area is around 48 square kilometres.Public transport is available to the attraction ,which is around 24 kms from Hyderabad.It is the perfect weekend getaway for the Hyderabadis.Green lush surroundings and cool breeze from the lake is perfect setting for picnic.On weekends place is too crowded.Ocean park and Chilukuri Balaji temple are nearby attractions

Name: Rajesh k
Title: Enjoy a morning walk
Review: This time due to heavy rains in Hyderabad city, we got a chance to see Osman Sagar lake filled with water.  This lake is located in the middle of Hyderabad, within the hustle and bustle of the large city.  The best time to visit this is morning time during with air pollution and city traffic noise is minimum.  There are land scaped gardens near the lake where one could enjoy a morning walk or simply spend quality time watching the lake.

Name: Ravin K
Title: nice drive in the evenings
Review: ist a nice drive in the evenings. worth checking if u are in the area. not worth a special drive as such

Name: Veer2468
Title: Nice view
Review: This lake offers a nice view. We cannot go till the lake. We can just take a walk along he road. Not bad to visit.

Name: shivaraikod
Title: Hang out in Oct -Dec
Review: This place would be for a half day visit where we can enjoy the breeze and is one of the future reservoirs of twin cities. Eateries are a bit scare here which may be incresed as more ppl flock considering it as a leisure place to hang out.

Name: Nishant M
Title: Nice place for a half day visit
Review: Went to this place with my friends. Well, its not that worth visiting, but if you have enough time with you, you might want to spare may be 2 hours for this place.

Name: Rimjhim B
Title: Lake in the center of the city
Review: This lake is located in the center of Hyderabad city.  It is a medium sized lake and not as big as the Hussain Sagar Lake. This lake provides water to Hyderabad city. This lake has low water levels and also dries up during certain parts of the year.  There are parks with beautiful lawns near this lake. It could be visited during the morning hours to enjoy fresh air and take a morning walk.

Name: Sumit S
Title: Ornament of Hederabad/Secendrabad
Review: This waterbody is big relief to the city. It is very nice to have a walk in the morning or evening. Enjoy food near the lake have some water sports.

Name: priteshkulkarni
Title: just Another Lake in City
Review: Osman Sagar Lake is another Lake from Hyderabad city. It is small Lake as compare to Hussain Sagar Lake. Good to visit only if you have extra time in Hyderabad else you can skip it.

Name: Sai R
Title: Serene lake
Review: It is a nice place to visit for a couple of hours after a Serene drive, especially in the monsoons. Ideal time to visit is either sunrise or sunset. The lake has dried up over last couple of years and not much water these days.

Name: spgoyalmnit
Title: Must visit in the Morning
Review: Reach there early morning for best experience. Before visit make sure lake has good amount of water.There is one garden downside so you can experience it from close.

Name: Azeez K
Title: Nice memories
Review: Visited so many times with family and friends, njoyed some good quality time with friends and family.

Name: ST_INDIA
Title: Good lake but can be maintained more
Review: Its a very big and Good lake but can be maintained more like the Hussain Sagar. The options here are far less than the Hussain Sagar. Still you can enjoy the view from certain points.

Name: rupak19602016
Title: Just imagine a huge lake in the city center!
Review: This is a huge lake right in the middle of the city. The surrounding pavements and parks around this huge lake are clean and well maintained by the municipality. The people are careful and don't throw litter into the lake. This lake has great utility in providing water to the huge twin metropolis of Hyderabad and Secundrabad. This artificially built lake is a standing example of good governance on the part of the Qutabshahi dynasty that ruled this kingdom for decades.

Name: Beach170
Title: it was good to see it was nice place with friends
Review: only 120and 220 bus number available it is to see the place is nice and no water falls of osman sagar lake we cannot see the bridge of water flowing only somw water is available there rock garden and  Dwaraka garden is there

Name: HOD H
Title: it was good to see it was nice place with friends
Review: only 120 no bus and 220 no bus available for gandipet lake or osman sagar lake dwaraka garden and rock garden was available there is no bridge for water flow

Name: SUMIT KUMAR G
Title: Osman Sagar
Review: Did not like that much.. It is not as clean as it used to be. Good for some weekend timepass for 1-2 hours.

Name: Michael Anbumani
Title: Beautiful Garden Lake
Review: Wow! it's a wonderful drive round the lake & garden experience we have had. This is the first time we are in Hyderabad & it's was a great experience to visit so many attraction in a short time. Our driver was an experience guy who took us round the lake & explained t us many new things around this area.Very refreshing visit.

Name: edwardseco
Title: Any visitor to Hyderabad will drive by this lake
Review: This is a striking lake that inevitably visitors drive and perhaps take for granted. Its a nice stroll and has boating at the club. The ASI museum is a hidden gem nearby in the park and shouldn't be missed.

Name: Chandrapc
Title: nice place
Review: from gandipet we had been to this place visited in rainy reason so it is having water also surroundings trees are there suddenly it was drizzling we went under the tree and had thrill spent some time it is peaceful and lovely breezes most relaxation will be there in our busy life

Name: SuvodipMoitra
Title: Nice place to go for a evening trip
Review: About 15 mins drive from Gachibowli. Good place to go & enjoy summer breeze in the summer evenings 530-630pm, see the sunset & come back.

Name: Hanif C
Title: Huge Lake in middle of City
Review: The lake is really huge and located in the middle of the city very next to secundrabad, lake it self has great view and too many birds around it.

Name: Anil_aak4
Title: Nice place to be with yourself
Review: Best time to visit would be Jan-feb. Its a quite enormous place with park adjacent to it.You would not miss to note the British dam technology.Nice place to be with yourself and spend some time in peace.

Name: IpsitaPal
Title: Serene and beautiful
Review: I love this lake as its away from the hustle of the city and offers a peaceful retreat. Park your car near the entrance and eat some yummy fried fish in the evening. Or simply pack a picnic and enjoy it under the shade of a tree.

Name: kvjayco
Title: A place to spend sometime away from city
Review: Osman sagar lake, one of the sources of drinking water to the Hyderabad city is a nice place to spend the evenings on the laek front, and in the months of Jan/Feb, we can see some good birds. The Agricultural Univ and other research centers are located close to this lake.

Name: Girish S
Title: I thought it was an ocean .. no no , it is a lake
Review: I wondered if it was a sea , but no it is only a lake , so huge , go by the ring road to have a huge breathtaking view of this lake . One of the few lakes that provide water to hyderabad.

Name: Sarah E
Title: Stinky and Foul
Review: What a shame that such beauty would be marred by the foul stench of refuge that pours into this lake.  The smell is very off putting indeed.  I am sure it is a marvel but one has no time to admire this when you are trying to hold your breadth.  Hyderabad, do something about this.

Name: DRSSDASH
Title: Mir Osman Alikhan Lake
Review: Built in the year 1920 on River Musi by Mir Osman Ali Khan.Now the main source of drinking water to the city of Hyderabad. The gardens surrounding the lakes are famous for picnic spot.

Name: Kunal Nagda
Title: Nice place
Review: Could be visited once, Many be with family and friends ideal for spending couple of hours, good for killing time

Name: vibha123
Title: Osman sagar reminds me of VIzag beachline...
Review: OSman sagar is very peaceful however now polluted very badly...there are corporates who work as volunteers as part of CSR to clean Osman sagar..When you just want to break out from your life/day at work/home....best is to drive till Osman sagar and spend sometime with water...peace and fresh and then get back with energy you need to fight the battle of life...

Name: sudmaha
Title: Was a good place.
Review: In the past few years the water of the lake not left. some where in the middle there is some water left, so people go with their families. nothing special now.

Name: DebashishS
Title: Natural Lake
Review: Beautiful lake, feels very good to be at in the evenings. There is a park attached to it which is open till 5 pm and can be used as picnic spot.

Name: Lucky M
Title: For a early morning drive
Review: A beautiful serene lake. Nothing much to do though! Just to enjoy cool breeze with a bunch of friends. One can enjoy a nice drive to the place too as it is in outskirts of the city!

Name: 85Mohan
Title: Losing its sheen day by day
Review: Years ago, this used to be a picnic spot. Because of urbanization and less rains, the area has become dry. Finally, this is one of the two places from where Hyderabad receives water. So, I have high regards for this area. Today we see this place as spot for college students to bunk and enjoy.

Name: Naganna Travel and Food Expert
Title: Nice Place....
Review: Nice and Good hangout place.... one would feel great while driving on this Gandipet lake.... small garden is also available to see.... nice to sit over their with some snacks....

Name: Suraj P
Title: Excellent
Review: Drive on the Gandipet Lake's road is really beautiful. Nice weather & there is a garden too to hang out with friends.

Name: seedhunter
Title: Nice place to chill
Review: It is also known as Gandipet lake. Located approx 15 km from Hitech City, it is a place where you can spend some time with friends and family. A small garden is also there.
